intro_text: The cats head out into the forested slopes, hiding from the heat of greenleaf, p_l leading them towards a massive messy eagle nest.
decline_text: When they get there p_l can't find the hummingbird they were expecting. Disappointing.
success_text: app1 screws up their face in confusion - weren't they here to learn about hummingbirds, not eagles? p_l, in a low whisper, carefully points out the tiny nest sitting in the shadow of the big one. Hummingbirds use the big predator's nest to conceal and protect their own tiny ones, they explain.

p_l tells app1 to watch carefully - not the rowdy eagle nest, but the tiny home in its shadow, where a female hummingbird climbs out and takes to the wing, headed for the mountain meadows. app1's jaw drops as she whizzes past, nearly soundless, blindingly fast, and zigzagging through the trees in a way app1 swore was impossible for birds.

As they hide, watching the hummingbird nest in the shadow of the eagle nest, s_c tells app1 how c_n's founders followed the hummingbird's wisdom, setting up the Clan in the shadow of the dangers of the mountain to protect c_n cats from the attention of Twolegs and endless wars with other cat clans.
fail_text: app1 refuses to believe that going near an eagle nest could ever possibly be safe and flatly refuses to go.
p_l can't get app1 to take the training session seriously, and gives up before the apprentice can attract the eagles' attention.

intro_text: The cats head out into the forested slopes, hiding from the heat of greenleaf, p_l leading them towards a massive messy eagle nest.
decline_text: When they get there p_l can't find the hummingbird they were expecting. Disappointing.
success_text: app1 screws up their face in confusion - weren't they here to learn about hummingbirds, not eagles? p_l, in a low whisper, carefully points out the tiny nest sitting in the shadow of the big one. Hummingbirds use the big predator's nest to conceal and protect their own tiny ones, they explain.

p_l tells app1 to watch carefully - not the rowdy eagle nest, but the tiny home in its shadow, where a female hummingbird climbs out and takes to the wing, headed for the mountain meadows. app1's jaw drops as she whizzes past, nearly soundless, blindingly fast, and zigzagging through the trees in a way app1 swore was impossible for birds.

As they hide, watching the hummingbird nest in the shadow of the eagle nest, s_c tells app1 how the hummingbird arrival signals the start of greenleaf, and how the Clan will know it's leaf-fall when the birds leave their territory. The more hummingbirds there are that year, the better a greenleaf it'll be.
fail_text: app1 refuses to believe that going near an eagle nest could ever possibly be safe and flatly refuses to go.
p_l can't get app1 to take the training session seriously, and gives up before the apprentice can attract the eagles' attention.

intro_text: The cats head out into the forested slopes, hiding from the heat of greenleaf, p_l leading them towards a massive messy eagle nest.
decline_text: When they get there p_l can't find the hummingbird they were expecting. Disappointing.
success_text: app1 screws up their face in confusion - weren't they here to learn about hummingbirds, not eagles? p_l, in a low whisper, carefully points out the tiny nest sitting in the shadow of the big one. Hummingbirds use the big predator's nest to conceal and protect their own tiny ones, they explain, astonishing app2.

p_l tells the apprentices to watch carefully - not the rowdy eagle nest, but the tiny home in its shadow, where a female hummingbird climbs out and takes to the wing, headed for the mountain meadows. app1's jaw drops as she whizzes past, nearly soundless, blindingly fast, and zigzagging through the trees in a way app1 swore was impossible for birds.

As they hide, watching the hummingbird nest in the shadow of the eagle nest, s_c tells the apprentices how c_n's founders followed the hummingbird's wisdom, setting up the Clan in the shadow of the dangers of the mountain to protect c_n cats from the attention of Twolegs and endless wars with other cat clans.
fail_text: app1 refuses to believe that going near an eagle nest could ever possibly be safe and flatly refuses to go. app2 tries to comfort them, but the patrol is called off.
p_l can't get app1 or app2 to take the training session seriously, and gives up before the apprentices can attract the eagles' attention.

fail_text: app1 refuses to believe that going near an eagle nest could ever possibly be safe and flatly refuses to go. app2 tries to comfort them, but the patrol is called off.
p_l can't get app1 or app2 to take the training session seriously, and gives up before the apprentices can attract the eagles' attention.

intro_text: With p_l in the lead, the cats round a corner in the mountain path and come across a flat mountain meadow, transformed by greenleaf into a carpet of sunny bright flowers.
decline_text: When they get there p_l can't find the hummingbirds they were expecting. Disappointing.
success_text: app1 sticks their nose down into the soft dew-covered meadowgrass, searching for prey scent, but p_l's tail flicks under their chin, prompting their head up. They gasp. Above them, a male hummingbird hovers, his full breeding plumage flashing brilliantly in the sun.

They're here to follow the hummingbirds, p_l explains with a laugh, and dives into the thick meadowgrass sea. app1 spends the afternoon bounding through the flowers, following the birds as the males fight, learning about how hummingbirds signal good hunting areas and the easy times of greenleaf.

s_c pulls app1's attention towards the flashing hummingbirds darting about. Once upon a time a fire threatened to consume everything but the bare rock of the mountains, but StarClan caught its embers, stopping it from spreading. They released those embers in greenleaf, to fly above the flowering meadows they'd saved from destruction.
fail_text: app1 won't stop their hunting attempts for long enough for p_l to teach, and eventually everyone goes home frustrated.

intro_text: With p_l in the lead, the cats round a corner in the mountain path and come across a flat mountain meadow, transformed by greenleaf into a carpet of sunny bright flowers.
decline_text: When they get there p_l can't find the hummingbirds they were expecting. Disappointing.
success_text: app1 sticks their nose down into the soft dew-covered meadowgrass, searching for prey scent, but p_l's tail flicks under their chin, prompting their head up. They gasp. Above them, a male hummingbird hovers, his full breeding plumage flashing brilliantly in the sun.

They're here to follow the hummingbirds, p_l explains with a laugh, and dives into the thick meadowgrass sea. app1 spends the afternoon bounding through the flowers, following the birds as the males fight, learning about how hummingbirds signal good hunting areas and the easy times of greenleaf.

app1 leaps into the meadows, running around maniacally as hummingbirds flit away before them. s_c watches them indulgently, and when they slow down s_c explains about how c_n uses hunting the agile birds as the ultimate test - it's considered the mark of a truly fantastic hunter to catch one without using your claws and pluck a single shining feather.
fail_text: app1 won't stop their hunting attempts for long enough for p_l to teach, and eventually everyone goes home frustrated.
